verses.verse: M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> was twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and he reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>:

But did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, like unto the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> had cast out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

For he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> which Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H3169><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had broken down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and he reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> for Baalim <S%H1168><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> groves <S%H842><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them.

Also he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, whereof the YY <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, In Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> shall my name <S%H8034><s%> be for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> for all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And he caused <S%H5674><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>: also he observed times <S%H6049><s%> <S%H8782><s%>, and used enchantments <S%H5172><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and used witchcraft <S%H3784><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and dealt <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with a familiar spirit <S%H178><s%>, and with wizards <S%H3049><s%>: he wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

And he set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a carved image <S%H6459><s%>, the idol <S%H5566><s%> which he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, in the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, of which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> and to SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, In this house <S%H1004><s%>, and in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, which I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, will I put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5865><s%>:

Neither will I any more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> remove <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the foot <S%H7272><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from out <S%H5921><s%> of the land <S%H127><s%> which I have appointed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for your fathers <S%H1><s%>; so that <S%H518><s%> they will take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all that I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them, according to the whole Torah <S%H8451><s%> and the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

So M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> made <S%H8582><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> to err <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> worse <S%H7451><s%> than the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, and to his people <S%H5971><s%>: but they would not hearken <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

Wherefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon them the captains of <S%H8269><s%> the host of <S%H6635><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%>, which took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> among the tshofars <S%H2336><s%>, and bound him <S%H631><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with fetters <S%H5178><s%>, and carried <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

And when he was in affliction <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, he besought <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and humbled <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%> himself greatly <S%H3966><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>,

And prayed <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> unto him: and he was intreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of him, and heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his supplication <S%H8467><s%>, and brought him again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> into his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>. Then M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> he was 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

Now after this <S%H310><s%> he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a wall <S%H2346><s%> without <S%H2435><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, on the west side <S%H4628><s%> of Gihon <S%H1521><s%>, in the valley <S%H5158><s%>, even to the entering in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> at the fish <S%H1709><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, and compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> about Ophel <S%H6077><s%>, and raised it up <S%H1361><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a very great height <S%H3966><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%> of war <S%H2428><s%> in all the fenced <S%H1219><s%> <S%H8803><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And he took away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the idol <S%H5566><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and all the altars <S%H4196><s%> that he had built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them out <S%H2351><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And he repaired <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereon peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> and thank offerings <S%H8426><s%>, and commanded <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> did sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8802><s%> still in the high places <S%H1116><s%>, yet unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> only.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, and his prayer <S%H8605><s%> unto his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and the words <S%H1697><s%> of the seers <S%H2374><s%> that spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> to him in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, behold, they are written in the book <S%H1697><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

His prayer <S%H8605><s%> also, and how 'Elohim was intreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H8736><s%> of him, and all his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and his trespass <S%H4604><s%>, and the places <S%H4725><s%> wherein he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> high places <S%H1116><s%>, and set up <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8689><s%> groves <S%H842><s%> and graven images <S%H6456><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> he was humbled <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8736><s%>: behold, they are written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> among the sayings <S%H1697><s%> of the seers <S%H2374><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H2335><s%>.

So M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%>, and they buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in his own house <S%H1004><s%>: and Amon <S%H526><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

Amon <S%H526><s%> was two <S%H8147><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

But he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, as did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>: for Amon <S%H526><s%> sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto all the carved images <S%H6456><s%> which M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them;

And humbled <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8738><s%> not himself before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, as M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had humbled <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8736><s%> himself; but Amon <S%H526><s%> trespassed <S%H819><s%> more and more <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.
And his servants <S%H5650><s%> conspired <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against him, and slew <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him in his own house <S%H1004><s%>.

But the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all them that had conspired <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against king <S%H4428><s%> Amon <S%H526><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> made <S%H4427><s%> Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in his stead.
